column5: Thought this was worth a bump before the weekend.

The sad new is it's probably chopped up and sold. Had two brand new rangers stolen from our lot and within 12 hrs both boats were burned to the ground sans 225 which were eventually found in another province.

Goes like this , my friend Marc is a single Dad and work a full time mechanic job to support his sons racing career, and let me tell you the kid is GREAT!!  This past weekend, Marc and Emmanuel were attending the Toronto Snowmobile Show, their Truck, Wagon and Emmanuel's Snowmobile were stolen from the parking lot in the middle of the night from the Motel they were staying at. .  Keep a close eye out for these please...... 2004 Chevy Silverado 2x4 with a 2" lowering kit, peuter in color 22" rims and hankook tires ( not the exact picture but as close as I can find, owner did not have a picture to share ) PLATE NUMBER IS 609 2XB   The sled was his Sons racing sled.    One of a kind...    trailer had his Sons racing numbers on it # 221 as seen in the pics of the sled, there is also a sticker on the back that says "TOY DOCTOR" which is a business in Redbridge Ontario and should also show the phone number (705) 663-2361    Your reward will be a Happy Kid & Dad!  Thanks Gang!  Randy
WTH that just sucks it takes all kinds for sure. I hope they get it back for his sons sake.
I know how that feels  I only wish we were allowed to shoot them once they are found
I'll be watching.  somebody broke into my truck the other day... stole a pack of smokes and loose change, yet left my tackle, rain suit, fishing gear. Lucky me; your friend/son, not so much.
*********  BUMP  **********  C'mon guys ........   please keep an OFC Eye out for these items..  Marc and Emmanuel thank you!
I'm friends with the guys who run the OFSC club down here and some sled racers, i will let them know.  Shared via FB as well
I'm far away but you never know.
I'll be looking!
That sucks Randy.
blah i feel for the kid, hope they find it.. it happened it toronto? probably ended up down the 403, happens far to often around here
same here  Randy, post on the FB group too.
passed it along to people who hopefully can help spread the word
Yup !!
X2 Keeping an eye out and shared of FB as well.
On the lookout up here as well .
Sent to some friends who have some expertise.
same as harrison here,and i got it from several people on my facebook this morning too !!!! word is out....big time....
Make that a couple more sets of eyes on it for you. I'll spread it around to my friends as well.
Thanks for all the help Gang !!!!
I'll keep my eyes and ears open. I can't believe the balls some people have???? Just disgusting!

Nah. They'll be off trail somewhere going over severely deep pow and flip their machines over. The 15 mile hike out postholing in the same pow leaves them severely frost bitten and blubbering like idiots. By the time they find their sleds in the spring, they'll have been stripped down to the tracks leaving nothing but a few errant bolts. After which point, their wives, if they have any, will shoot them.
All I can say is "SCUMBAGS"! Welcome to Toronto eh? I will definitely keep my eye out!
Randy, I added the post to a few other sites too that cover the GTA and all of ON as well.  good luck!
I like to hear that!
